page.title: 01GENERAL-SUTTON ST. JAMES
page.content: {AREA:-}South Holland District, in the Fens. {POPULATION:- }Approx. 540 {NEAREST TOWNS:- }Long Sutton, Holbeach, Spalding. {SCHOOL:-}Sutton St. James County Primary,roll about I3O.{ {CHURCHES:-}Parish Church of St. James,Baptist Chapel. {SHOPS:- }general store, Post Office, butcher's shop, hairdresser, garage, pub. {MAIN FEATURE:-}St. James' Church. {CLUBS, LEISURE ACTIVITIES :- }Good Companions, W.I., Brownies,Cubs, Guides, Dancing classes, Yoga, and various sports in season. {HOUSING::- }Mainly detached,lots of bungalows. Some semi-detached,nearly all with large gardens. Materials:- mainly red brick and tiles.
